wikipedia_page.main: Francis Patrick Neill, Baron Neill of Bladen,  (8 August 1926 – 28 May 2016) was a British barrister and cross bench member of the House of Lords.

* Patrick Neill, Baron Neill of Bladen (1926–2016), member of the House of Lords
In 1996, Geidt married Emma Charlotte Angela Neill, younger daughter of Patrick Neill, Baron Neill of Bladen."Marriages." The Times, [London, England], 16 July 1996. The couple have two daughters.
He nominated his immediate predecessor as Warden, Patrick Neill, Baron Neill of Bladen, for the office of Chancellor of the University of Oxford.
He had four children, including the paediatrician Catherine Neill (1921–2006), the judge Sir Brian Neill (1923–2017) and the barrister Patrick Neill, Baron Neill of Bladen (1926–2016).
